CustomField.description: This field is created for identifying the User type of the logged-in user. This field will be used in Report for filtering the Reports
CustomField.formula: IF(OwnerId = $User.Id , 'Sales Director', IF(Apttus_QPApprov__ProposalId__r.OwnerId = $User.Id , 'Account Manager', IF(AND(Apttus_Approval__Initial_Submitter__c <> Apttus_QPApprov__ProposalId__r.OwnerId ,Apttus_Approval__Initial_Submitter__c = $User.Id),'Deal Enablement Support','')))
CustomField.label: User Type
